definitions: To succeed in reaching a particular place or destination.
To arrive at a place or attend an event.
To succeed in a particular endeavor or profession.
To survive a difficult or dangerous situation.
To be able to attend or do something.
examples: We made it to the top of the mountain.
Can you make it to the party tonight?
She really wants to make it as a singer.
He was badly injured, but he made it.
I hope I can make it to the meeting.
It's tough to make it in this industry.
